title: PHP, Zend 3 Framework developer required for image processing module
snippet:
I need a developer who can work on PHP and Zend 3 Framework on a specific module. The exact requirement is image processing from photo image to text conversion
1. Images of multiple language and most countries passports, driving licenses, national IDs and other relevant documents which contains users personal, travel details along with photograph will be supplied
2. ID documents shall either be scanned directly by webcam of PC or laptops or mobile camera and/or browse upload option
3. In Zend 3.x framework PHP language, an image processing module needs to be developed for web, android & iOS apps so that text in the image shall be extracted by MRZ/OCR scanning and saved in DB to match details of the user
Please apply for those who can exactly complete this work in short period.

Analyze existing free API, codes available in the market, and post with details such as how you plan to work on the project Analyze existing free APIs, codes available online, and apply for this job with details such as how you plan to work on the project? how you will execute the project? provide worked samples on image processing projects etc.
